content: repeat 18 make two using color a stuff the tail and position it on the round 15 double_crochet around 18 round 1 chain 2 6 double_crochet in second chain from hook lower back of your dinosaur it will be stuff firmly round 2 double_crochet 2 increase repeat 8 hard for your t-rex to stand using just round 16 double_crochet decrease repeat 12 round 3-7 double_crochet around 5 rnds his feet alone so you want to attach round 17 decrease 6 times 6 slip_stitch to join tie off and leave a long tail the tail low enough to touch the ground finish off weave in tail lightly stuff with a tiny pinch of stuffing and help it balance when standing repeat for other foot upright use pins to hold the tail in belly place and stitch around to secure legs crocheting in row across not in the attach the arms to the body make two using color a round using color b keep the spines flat and attach them round 1 chain 2 6 double_crochet in second chain from hook row 1 chain 9 turn down the back of your t-rex there round 2 increase in each st 12 row 2 double_crochet across 8 chain 1 turn should be room for 3 spines on the round 3 double_crochet increase repeat 18 row 3 double_crochet across 8 chain 1 turn head and 3 spines on the body you the arms ready to sew on round 4 double_crochet 2 increase repeat 24 after each of the following row chain 1 might want to pin them on to make sure congratulations round 5-9 double_crochet around 5 rnds before turning that they are spaced evenly round 10 double_crochet 2 decrease repeat 18 row 4 increase double_crochet 6 increase 10 if you chose to use safety eyes the eyes now your t-rex is finished round 11 double_crochet 4 decrease repeat 15 row 5 double_crochet across 10 should already be in place to create row 6 double_crochet increase double_crochet 3 increase double_crochet 2 increase double_crochet 13 felt eyes cut two ovals out of white felt row 7-9 double_crochet across 3 row paint on a black circle and a white dot row 10 double_crochet increase double_crochet 9 increase double_crochet 15 to give the eye some shine black and painting row 11-13 double_crochet across 3 row white felt circles could also be all about kristel koevenig the eyes row 14 decrease double_crochet 5 decrease double_crochet 4 decrease 12 substituted instead of paint let dry milesofcrochet etsy com row 15 double_crochet across 12 before gluing or sewing to the head row 16 decrease double_crochet 3 decrease double_crochet 3 decrease 9 button eyes could also be used row 17 decrease double_crochet 2 decrease double_crochet decrease 6 using black yarn make two long kristel koevenig fell in love with crochet when she discovered amigurumi now she designs row 18 decrease double_crochet 2 decrease 4 stitches into the nose to create the her own amigurumi patterns often inspired by tv video games books
